otp.group6.audioeditor

Class AudioManipulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • otp.group6.audioeditor.AudioManipulator

  • public class AudioManipulator
extends java.lang.Object
    AudioManipulator is a class that is used to create and operate the mixer. Class includes methods for manipulating WAV files with five different effects. Class also includes general audio player methods for audio playback.
    Author:
    Roosa Laukkanen, Onni Lukkarila

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void audioFileReachedEnd()
      Informs controller that playing audio has finished because audio file has reached its end
      boolean checkIfUnsavedMixedFile()
      Checks if there is an unsaved file in AudioManipulator.
      private void createAudioProcessors()
      Creates following audio processors: WaveformSimilarityBasedOverlapAdd, RateTransposer, DelayEffect, GainProcessor, FlangerEffect, LowPassSP and AudioPlayer
      void disableDelayEffect()
      Sets echo length to 1 and decay to 0 (original values)
      void disableFlangerEffect()
      Sets flanger length to 0.01, wetness to 0 and LFO to 5 (original values)
      void disableGainEffect()
      Sets gain to 1.0 (original value)
      void disableLowPassEffect()
      Sets low pass to 44100 (original value)
      void disablePitchEffect()
      Sets pitch to 1.0 (original value)
      private javax.sound.sampled.AudioFormat getAudioFormat()
      Default AudioFormat suitable with AudioDispatcher
      double getEffectValue(java.lang.String effectName)
      Returns the current value of one of the following effects depending on the parameter
      void pauseAudio()
      Pauses audio playback and saves the current playback time
      void playAudio()
      Plays the selected audio file and creates a timer that updates the audio file's progress bar
      void playFromDesiredSec(double seconds)
      Starts playback from desired part of the file
      void recordAudio()
      Records audio file using default input data line

      • AudioManipulator

        public AudioManipulator(Controller controller)
        Creates a new AudioManipulator. Constructor requires the controller from MVC pattern as its parameter.
        Parameters:
        controller -

    • Method Detail

      • checkIfUnsavedMixedFile

        public boolean checkIfUnsavedMixedFile()
        Checks if there is an unsaved file in AudioManipulator.
        Returns:
        true if there is an unsaved file and false if there isn't an unsaved file

      • setAudioSourceFile

        public void setAudioSourceFile(java.io.File file)
        Creates an AudioDispatcher that uses given file as its audio source. Creates WaveformSimilarityBasedOverlapAdd, RateTransposer, DelayEffect, GainProcessor, FlangerEffect and LowPassSP and connects them to AudioDispatcher.
        Parameters:
        file - - WAV file

      • recordAudio

        public void recordAudio()
        Records audio file using default input data line

      • stopRecord

        public void stopRecord()
        Stops recording

      • testFilter

        public void testFilter()
        Method for testing AudioManipulator effects without audio file source. Creates a new AudioDispatcher and audio effects using default input data line as its source.

      • saveFile

        public boolean saveFile(java.lang.String path)
        Saves AudioManipulator's mixed file to the path given as a parameter
        Parameters:
        path - - Path where the file is to be saved
        Returns:
        true if saving was succesful, false if not

      • createAudioProcessors

        private void createAudioProcessors()
        Creates following audio processors: WaveformSimilarityBasedOverlapAdd, RateTransposer, DelayEffect, GainProcessor, FlangerEffect, LowPassSP and AudioPlayer

      • disablePitchEffect

        public void disablePitchEffect()
        Sets pitch to 1.0 (original value)

      • disableGainEffect

        public void disableGainEffect()
        Sets gain to 1.0 (original value)

        public void disableDelayEffect()
        Sets echo length to 1 and decay to 0 (original values)

        public void disableFlangerEffect()
        Sets flanger length to 0.01, wetness to 0 and LFO to 5 (original values)

      • disableLowPassEffect

        public void disableLowPassEffect()
        Sets low pass to 44100 (original value)

      • getEffectValue

        public double getEffectValue(java.lang.String effectName)
        Returns the current value of one of the following effects depending on the parameter
        Parameters:
        effectName - can be any of the following:
        • "pitch" - method returns the current value of pitch
        • "gain"
        • "echoLength"
        • "decay"
        • "flangerLength"
        • "wetness"
        • "lfo"
        • "lowPass"
        if the parameter given is none of the following, method returns 0
